page.title: 13Wat Tyler Country Park
page.content:
Alfred Nobel had a dynamite factory here. Workers would walk to the nearby pub, "The Gun". Lots of redevelopment taking place in the park, new visitor centre, heritage buildings, but the interesting National Motorboat Museum is being made into an Eco-centre, a national asset lost! RSPB increasing the area of the park. As a military base, in WW1, horses were loaded into barges to be taken to France. Some of the buildings have military connections, A place to take a very relaxing stroll.
Contribution by: Rod Holt
